alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 24 at 2:54AM MST until December 24 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Gila River Valley and White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving hazardous. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing snow is possible late in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
